__Question__.gen:
Suppose you are creating a model of the system described in the italicized paragraph below.

You are modeling a population of beavers. There are 20 beavers alive in the first year. Assume that births are the only change on this beaver population (there are no deaths, immigration, or emigration occurring). The number of beaver births each year is 30% of the beaver population.

Assume you are modeling the system described below in italics.

Brandon has 100 video games. Each week he buys two more games.
